data.actual_result: Clyde icon is not scaled correctly and overlaps into the channel
data.expected_result: Clyde icon is scaled correctly and doesn't overlap into the channel
data.short_description: When an image/gif preview is small enough, and doesn't load, the Clyde icon overlaps into the channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Send an image/gif link that is large in a channel (I have a gif that worked for me, which I'll attach) - Observe the bottom of the Clyde icon in the unloaded preview
